backend/main.mo: IC actor storing unique inquiries using a Set and exposing submit and query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence showing removal of hero metrics tied to HeroSection.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to brief descriptions of their purpose.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level layout composing header, hero, services, process, FAQ, contact, and footer sections.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with branding, navigation links, services list, and contact/CTA links.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky responsive header with navigation, email/WhatsApp CTAs, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Contact form with validation, WhatsApp/email options, and inquiry submission via mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/marketing/FaqSec: Accordion-based FAQ list with six predefined questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Marketing hero section with headline, description, CTA buttons, and an illustration.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Proces: Displays a five-step workflow with icons and descriptions for the company's process.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Renders a grid of service cards with icons, descriptions, and CTAs linking to the contact section.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication state and login flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitInquiryMutat: Mutation hook that submits an inquiry via the backend actor and invalidates the inquiries query on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom design tokens defining a warm color palette and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/inquiryLinks.ts: Generates prefilled WhatsApp and email inquiry links with default contact info and messages.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, current feature set, and requirements for building a business-focused marketing website. Lists implemented features like site structure, services content, trust-building sections, and lead-generation elements.
